title: If the reservation proposed to be relocated is beyond 500 m
clause_text: If the reservation proposed to be relocated is beyond 500 m. from the original location in the Development Plan; If the reservation proposed to be relocated is beyond the holding of the same owner;
section: 3.11 RELOCATION OF D.P. / R.P. SITES / ROADS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If the reservation proposed to be relocated is beyond 500 m. from the original location in the Development Plan;
